description: A sudoku solver that can solve even evil sudokus using multiple strategies such as "Hidden Pairs", "Naked Pairs", and "Pointing Arrows".
A truth table generator which goes through all the possible combinations and lists them in a table.
A tool to generate TypeScript definitions from JSON. Uses @lusc/json-dts
A tool to unlock .docx and .xlsx that have been set to readonly.
An interface for @faker-js/faker to generate data on a small, manual scale.

A little page which imitates Samsung Health, but instead of actually exercising you can just modify the values right from your sofa. I made this so I don't have to do PE homework when I don't feel like doing it.
A simple page in which you can convert hex from and to rgb(a).
Calculate the least common multiple (lcm) and greatest common divisor (gcd).
text: Least Common Multple & Greatest Common Divisor

description: A fancy clock made up of bars moving up and down.
A tool which allows you to sort json5 by its keys.
A triangle that moves around and flashes.
An extension for Firefox that allows you to get a summary of your marks from schulNetz and tells you if you're passing or failing.
A bunch of userscripts that improve the experience on moodle like hiding unused courses from the sidebar (Clean Moodle) or adding icons to courses on the sidebar (Custom Icons).
